TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ColorTypeConverter extends System.ComponentModel.ExpandableObjectConverter

summary.span: Provides type converters for converting objects to and from objects of other types.

span.span: Provides type converters for converting objects to and from objects of other types.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Diese Klasse verfügt auch über Methoden zum Schreiben einer auf ein [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_metro](~/includes/tlasharptla-metro-md.md)] Paket und Lesen von Daten eine aus ein [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_metro](~/includes/tla2sharptla-metro-md.md)] Paket, das eine Zeichenfolge angegeben wird, das darstellt der [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] von der .This class also has methods for writing a to an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_metro](~/includes/tlasharptla-metro-md.md)] package and reading a from an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_metro](~/includes/tla2sharptla-metro-md.md)] package that is given a string that represents the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] of the . Finden Sie unter den Basisklassen und für wichtige Verwendungshinweise.See the base classes and for important usage notes.
